39.eng-name: The Book on the Description of Hellfire
39.ara-name: كتاب صفة جهنم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that the Prophet (s.a.w) said:"This Fire of yours, which the sons of Adam kindle, is one part from seventy parts of the heat of the Hell." They said: "By Allah! Would it not have been enough O Messenger of Allah?!" He said: "It is sixty-nine parts more – all of them similar in heat.” (Sahih)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ نَارَكُمْ هَذِهِ جُزْءٌ مِنْ سَبْعِينَ جُزْءًا مِنْ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About: "This Fire of Yours Is One Part of the Seventy Parts of the Fire of Hell"
